thread.title: How to Dress Like Kanye, According to Brad Hall
thread.title_full: How to Dress Like Kanye, According to Brad Hall

author: Daniel Pearson
title: How to Dress Like Kanye, According to Brad Hall
text:
Deadpan comedian Brad Hall has long been considered a true great in the sneaker world (who else could tell us what the hardest to put on sneakers are?) — but it turns out he’s also something of a fashion guru.
In his latest video, Hall proves his fashionista credentials by offering up some sure-fire tips to nail the Kanye West vibe. After walking us through the right footwear (YEEZY Boosts, YEEZY military boots, Vans,) he explains why having “plenty of room in the seat and groin areas” is key to getting Kanye’s look right — which is why he’d never wear anything other than his trusty slacks.
Finally, he slips a camouflage tee over his checkered button-down to add the final, genius touch. Watch the video above, and if you disagree (you won’t,) you can always check out our own Kanye how-to guide .
In other news, here are the 22 best sneakers releasing this weekend and where to buy them.
